Trade/Device Name(s): FilmArray Global Fever Panel External Control Kit
Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FilmArray Global Fever Panel External Control Kit for assayed quality controls in microbiology PCR assays on FilmArray 2.0 systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use as assayed quality controls to monitor the performance of in vitro diagnostic laboratory nucleic acid testing procedures for qualitative detection of FilmArray Global Fever Panel targets on FilmArray 2.0 systems; designed solely for use with the FilmArray Global Fever Panel and does not replace internal manufacturer controls.
